sentences.sentence: Other boys saw it and began to laugh; then they all copied the first; and they ran round Philip, limping comically, screaming with shrill laughter.
sentences.translation: 其他的男孩看到了，开始大笑；然后他们都复制了第一个；他们围着菲利普跑着，滑稽地一瘸一拐地走着，尖声大笑着。

sentences.sentence: He began comically ad-libbing a script.
sentences.translation: 他开始即兴穿插一段剧本了。

sentences.sentence: In fact our admiration for the comically gifted is relatively new and not very well-founded, says Rod Martin, a psychologist at the University of Western Ontario.
sentences.translation: 西安大略大学的心理学家罗德马丁说：“事实上，我们对喜剧天才的崇拜是相对较新且没有根基的。”
